body: So hey guys, I just have a question. When will Staff Apps be open?
body_tagged: So hey guys, I just have a question. When will Staff Apps be open?
title: Staff Apps.

replies.body: When the admins and mods say.
replies.body_tagged: When the admins and mods say.

replies.body: I except them to open pretty soon. There is usually barely any staff on so I would think they need to open them asap.
replies.body_tagged: I except them to open pretty soon. There is usually barely any staff on so I would think they need to open them asap.

replies.body: Expect them here somewhere around 9 days.

replies.body:
September 1st - october 1st.

Says it in the staff applications page.

The application format is already out if that is what you were asking.
replies.body_tagged:
September 1st - october 1st.

Says it in the staff applications page.

replies.body:
I usually see between 3 to 8 staff members on.

maybe it's timezones
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
https://avicus.net/forums/4c80ee8a6 read this, if you want to apply. 

A little tip if you'd like to apply; Don't make an application in 15 minutes ;) You can take your time, and maybe don't post it at the first of september :P

replies.body: one question:for the staff apps do we just make a new discussion so everyone can see it?like post it on here?
